1.content: Dark spyro growled as he limped through the frozen wastelands of skylands, he cocked his head to the side in confusion as he saw a large ship sticking out of the ground. He entered the ship and found the control panel, does the ship have running power-
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
Dark spyro tossed his head back and cackled crazily as the room lit up and he walked into the next room and saw five glass containment cells with robots within them. He gulped nervously and moved his claws to his underbelly and scratched lightly to draw a few drops of blood into the containment cells and the robots copied his appearance and became clones of dark spyro. He returned to the command bridge and warped to the next the next dimension over.

Where does the story go from here-
11.title: Yes

111.content: Two changeling drones were patrolling through the changeling nest as they saw a large ship approaching as it landed next to them and dark spyro emerged with an evil smile on his muzzle. "Take me to your leader" he said as the two changelings exchanged confused glances and led him through the nest and to a throne room where they saw chrysalis sitting on the throne. "Changelings, whose this stranger you've brought before me" she asked as the two changeling drones looked at dark spyro and awaited his response. "I am dark spyro, from skylands and I've come here destroy your enemies known as the mane six" he said as chrysalis seemed pleased with this response. "Very well, changelings assist dark spyro with his mission" she said as the two changelings followed dark spyro to his ship and began their hunt for the first of the mane six, who are they hunting
111.title: Changeling nest

choices: Do they bring their new recruit to the changeling nest
Continue their hunt for the mane six
1111.content:
"Do be careful dashie" pinkie pie said as rainbow dash smiled at her and nodded as she took flight and jetted through the sky.

Dark spyro smiled wickedly as he saw rainbow flying in his crystal ball and pressed a button on the arm of his seat as the floor opened up

"Capture her" he commanded as the two changeling drones leapt from the ship and flew after her, rainbow dash flew up as they rammed into each other and dark spyro leapt from the ship and tackled her in the air and knocked her

She awoke on the ship as he stood before her, "don't be afraid my dear" he said as she looked around, the minute she looked away he bit into her neck and saw her body changeing

A changeling exoskeleton overtook her body as her eyes turned blue, fangs jutted out of her mouth and her mind morphed into a changeling drone as she knelt before dark spyro
1111.title: Rainbow dash

11111.content:
The ship landed back at the changeling nest as rainbow dash, now a changeling she knelt before chrysalis as she began to cackle evilly and turned to face dark spyro

"You've done well lieutenant dark spyro~" she purred as he nodded and she pressed her horn against his and upgraded his black scales into a changeling exoskeleton complete with a scorpion tail and dragonfly wings

"I thank you my queen" he said as she nodded and showed him an image of ponyville and explained the plan

"according to my spy the heroes have arrived and joined the mane six" she explained as she gestured to his ship "take the ship and destroy them all, but try to capture at least one or two" she said as he saluted and led several heavily armored changelings into the ship and took flight for ponyville

How many changelings does he take with him to capture ponyville
11111.title: Bring her to the changeling nest

111111.content:
The changelings were lined up in a row as dark spyro paced back and forth before them and explained the plan. "Rather than a frontal assault I plan to destroy the city from within and use the technology of the ship to capture residents of ponyville with the tractor beam while you distract the heroes" he said as he turned to face the heavily armored changelings

"Heavy changelings, you'll act as the direct attackers and charge the heroes while the changeling drones direct residents into our tractor beam" he commanded as the changelings saluted in synchronization and he opened the side of the ship, beginning the attack.

The changelings leapt from the ship as dark spyro released several drones from his ship, the four drones lined up and created a holographic force field that separated numerous residents from each other and warped them into corruption pods one by one.

We're any of the heroes warped onto his ship, and if so who are they

111112.content:
Dark spyro smirked at ponyville as the changelings wrecked havoc and he captured several ponies and teleported them onto his ship, he cackled as he slowly corrupted them into changeling drones for queen chrysalis.

Suddenly one of the pods exploded open and twilight sparkle emerged as her horn glowed threateningly, though he didn't show any fear and sheathed his claws with a smile.

"I'm impressed with your ability to resist my queen's influence" he said as twilight blasted him with magic from her horn, "she's no queen" she snapped as he spat a dark fireball and knocked her into the wall.

"I was gonna let you live but you disrespected my queen so now you die" he snarled as he began to strangle her with pure rage fueling him.

Suddenly she was teleported away and he realized that all the corruption pods were full and he teleported his changeling drones back onto his ship and warped back to the changeling nest.

Who saved twilight from dark spyro before he could kill her?

111113.content:
Spyro tore his claws out of the changeling drone that attacked him and threw her into a wall before a heavily armored changeling rammed into him from the side.

"Where'd all these things come from" he groaned to rarity as she helped him up with her magic, she blasted the heavily armored changeling directly into their ship and turned to face spyro.

"The changelings seem to be allied with whoever controls that ship, we take out the commander than they'll scatter" she said as another wave and freshly corrupted ponies leapt from the ship and onto the ground.

Yet leading this charge was dark spyro, "chrysalis told me you'd be here" he said as he eyed rarity and decided she'd be easy prey, "I can't wait to devour your soul" he snarled as he spat dark fire at her.

Spyro blocked with his wing and circled dark spyro, the changeling drones had stopped to watch the battle as had the heroes themselves.

Dark spyro lunged forward and pinned him down as spyro stabbed him in the stomach with his claws, yet they were ineffective due to his insectoid exoskeleton that chrysalis gave him, dark spyro smiled at the fear in his eyes and headbutted spyro unconscious, he tossed him aside and grabbed rarity by the throat and teleported himself and the other changelings onto the ship and back to the changeling nest.

Who does the story follow from here, rarity or spyro?

112.content:
Spyro awoke blushing from another dream about cynder as he shook the dream from his mind and saw a portal in the hallway as he woke up pop fizz, stealth elf, and eruptor and walked into it.

The arrived in a town inhabited by ponies of various colors and as a white pony with a purple mane and blue eyes walked up to them and began to talk with spyro

"Who're you" she asked as spyro introduced himself and the other skylanders to her as she introduced the other ponies of the mane six to them

"We came to ponyville because we sensed dark spyro in your dimension" spyro said as rarity gestured with her tail towards the image of the changeling nest on the map as spyro's jaw fell open

"You're saying he's in... there" squeaked pop fizz as pinky pie nodded and nudged him forward towards the map as he fainted from the sight of it and eruptor carried him off

"Until we get the chance to attack the changeling nest and capture dark spyro, you're welcome to sleep in the inn" spike offered as he led the skylanders through it to their rooms

When will they awaken
112.title: Ponyville

1122.content:
Cynder woke to a crash and saw a changeling drone get thrown through her window as pop fizz lunged after it in his beserker form and pummeled it crazily

Cyder shadow dashed outside and drop kicked a changeling drone chasing after button mash and cream heart as it crashed into the ground and rose to its hoofs quickly and flew up at her

Rarity used her powers to grab the changeling and slammed him into the ground repeatedly, cynder landed next to spyro as he gestured toward Canterlot castle and rushed towards the door to assist the two princesses

"Spyro wait" cynder yelled, but it was too late as something kicked the doors open and sent him tumbling back down the stairs

-Who or what had emerged to deal with the two dragons?
1122.title: An unexpected changeling attack

choices: The heroes follow the changeling swarm
The heroes do not follow the swarm
11221.content:
Spyro unsheathed his claws as dark spyro emerged from the canterlot castle and snarled in fury.

"Why don't you just leave me to my own devices" he growled as he spat dark fire at spyro, he rolled out of the way and spat fire at dark spyro

Dark spyro blocked with his wing and snarled as he took flight and retreated through a portal with the changeling swarm to the changeling nest
11221.title: Dark spyro

choices: The heroes follow the changeling swarm
The heroes do not follow the swarm
11222.content:
An elite changeling rammed through the doors and looked around with a smirk as his eyes landed on spyro and cynder as he hissed at them, "normally I wouldn't stick around any longer than I should but I'll never run from a battle of a worthy battle".

He growled and charged at spyro as cynder summoned a wall of bones that stunned the the changeling as spyro knocked him away with his tail, the changeling took to the sky and screeched as he retreated towards the changeling nest.
11222.title: An elite changeling

choices: The heroes follow the changeling swarm
The heroes do not follow the swarm
11223.content:
Neither of them could believe their eyes, queen chrysalis herself had used her magic and thrown the doors open, her green eyes gleamed sinisterly as she brushed her hair out of her face with her hoof and smiled

"So you're chrysalis are you" questioned spyro as he circled her left and cynder circled her right

"That's right youngling" she said as her horn glowed faintly and a sword flew past her and barley missed cynder's head as she froze in suprise

Spyro let out a roar, lowered his head and charged at chrysalis as she froze him in place and tossed him into cynder as she burst out laughing as they struggled to get off to each other

"You're not worth my time" she spat tauntingly "besides I've already got what I came for, changelings retreat" she ordered and flew off

Do the heroes follow the changeling swarm to their nest and attack them on their turf
11223.title: Queen chrysalis herself

12.content:
He snarled in rage as the ship powered up for a moment before quickly powering down as he stomped into the next room and saw five glass containment cells with robots within them. He gulped nervously as he moved his claws to his underbelly and scratched just enough to draw a few droplets of blood and inserted them into the glass containment cells, the robots copied his genetic signature and became clones of dark spyro as he led them into the main room again and they used their dark powers to reboot the ship and teleported to the next dimension

Where will the story go from here-
12.title: No

info.brief_description: Decide how the story of Skylanders/MLP plays out. Your choices affect who will win the war
info.description: I've decided to completely remake my Skylanders/MLP from wattpad and add choices and endings so my readers can be a part of the story and decide who will survive and if skylands and equestria will fall into the dark rule of queen chrysalis and her swarm of changeling drones
